description:
Gao and Kanata face off in the final round of the World Buddy Masters. Baku has prepared a special deck to counter the No-Damage Fighter, but Kanata has some unexpected tricks up his sleeve.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Final Round! Who is the World Number One?
Kesshousen! World Number 1 wa Dare Da!!
決勝戦! ワールドナンバー1は誰だ!!
